name: Harry Handheld and the Quest for Power
name_original: Harry Handheld and the Quest for Power
description:
This is my first game, and I didn't get as much done as I wanted to for the Jam, but am quite pleased with it. Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 73: Power

Collectibles do work but was unable to implement a counter in the time.

Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Attacks: Right / Left Mouse Button or E / R

I hope you enjoy this little game!
